current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the National Flood Insurance Act
		  of 1968 to allow the rebuilding, without elevation, of certain structures that
		  are located in areas having special flood hazards and are substantially damaged
		  by fire, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban
			 Affairs

suspend an area (or subdivision thereof)
